item.title: 2025 weekend trips and events
item.description:
A summary of weekend trips taken and events that we have attended during 2025, for memory keeping.

  • January: Bangalee & Shoalhaven Heads 3 days
  • June: Malua Bay for the long weekend

item.title: Rodney's Nursery & Garden Center
item.description:
If you are a Canberran and you enjoy gardening and growing vegetables, you should know about Rodney’s nursery and his cafÃ©. Ever since my mother moved to Canberra in March this year, I have been wanting to take her here for a meal. It has been raining for the past few weeks, and today it finally cleared up. The three of us wander here for lunch.

The garden cafÃ© was already quite busy at around 11:00 on a Sunday morning. Although it was a cold winter morning, the sun was out, and sitting by the outdoor electric heater, it didn’t feel cold at all.

item.title: Sydney Harbour Bridge Climb
item.description:
The Experience

John has bought me a ticketÂ for a full 3 hours ofÂ Sydney Harbour Bridge ClimbÂ for my birthday this year (thank you John!! ğŸ’• ). I have to say that I have always thought the bridge climb is an overpriced tourist thing. Why would I ever do that if I live here?! :) Nevertheless, I was excited to wake up at 3am to get ready for the bridge climb.
